skills.name: PUMMELLING BARRAGE
desc: • Deal 3 hits of physical damage to each enemy that increases based on your MISSING HP and their MISSING HP.
• Inflict Ignite on all enemies for 2 turns before dealing damage.
• Heal self for 25% of your MAX HP.

skills.name: LEAD INTO THE SEA
desc: • Deal 3 hits of physical damage to each enemy based on their MAX HP.
• Deal Addition Physical Damage to each enemy based on their MAX HP if they are at 50% HP or above.
• Inflict Punishment on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Permanently Increase Max HP on self by +100%.

skills.name: PENANCE OF NIGHTMARES
desc: Reduce Healing on each enemy by 75% until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn. 50% Chance to counterattack when anyone on your team takes damage. Heal for 50% of all damage dealt. Gain Endure for 1 turn when you take damage.
